title: Keeping The Beast At Bay
description: It's Izzy's job to clean up after the supernatural, she doesn't expect one of them to come knocking on her door...Izzy works to keep the supernatural world hidden from humans, by eliminating threats and hiding any suspicious deaths. When she is called out to help Adam Foster, she thinks it is just another job, until he starts following her. Now she faces new dangers and a cursed werewolf isn't even at the top of her list.
author: S.K. Gregory
